ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND
UNIVERSITY RELATIONS COMMITTEE
AND
PUBLIC SAFETY COMMITTEE
COMMITTEE MEETING
~ MINUTES ~
Wednesday, July 21, 2021

2:00 PM

Remote Meeting

The Public Safety Committee and the Economic Development & University Relations Committee
will meet jointly to hear from Saskia VannJames, President of the Massachusetts Recreational
Consumer Council, on the importance of cannabis cooperatives and their potential role in the
equitable development of Cambridge’s emerging recreational cannabis industry.
Attendee Name
Quinton Zondervan
Marc C. McGovern
Patricia Nolan
Dennis J. Carlone
Alanna Mallon
Jivan Sobrinho-Wheeler
Timothy J. Toomey

Present








Absent

Late

Arrived









A communication was received from Saskia VannJames, regarding a PowerPoint presentation titled
“Solidarity Economy with Cannabis Coops Utilizing Public Safety & Public Health for an
Intersectional Approach Towards Creating Sustainable Equitable Pathways for Economic Stability."

City of Cambridge
